features: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; Easy to create transactions to track expense, income, debt payments, build savings and pay bills on time; Set your own accounts for each of the 5 components of budgeting tracker under one dashboard.; Provides Complete Overview, Monthly Overview, Yearly Overview with dynamic filters to track specific dates as well.; Available for MacOS, Windows OS, iOS and Android devices.; Complete Budgeting Tracker Overview Dashboard; Notion Budget Tracker; Complete Interactive Guide; Notion Budget Tracker ($9 Value)
